headline: Ask HN: What are the best mobile blogging solutions?
description:
Now, I know a chunk of y’all are sitting there on a MBP or trusty Thinkpad going “Isn’t every solution mobile these days?”.

But what I’m shooting for is a solution that works on a mobile phone, via browser or app, that is more akin to the more minimalist markdown options out there for desktop users. Shuffling apps to upload and host an image from my phone then copy paste the url then going back to the writing app is a pain.

I figured some of y’all out there have gone more minimal by ditching the desktop for just a phone outside of the workplace.
headline_zh-Hans: Ask HN: 什么是最好的移动博客解决方案？
headline_zh-Hant: Ask HN: 什麼是最好的移動博客解決方案？
description_zh-Hans:
现在，我知道你们中的一大批人正坐在MBP或可靠的Thinkpad上，"现在不是所有的解决方案都是移动的吗？"

但我正在拍摄的是一个在手机上通过浏览器或应用程序工作的解决方案，它更类似于桌面用户的更简约的markdown选项。我想你们中的一些人在工作场所之外，已经抛弃了台式机，只用一部手机，从而实现了更多的简约。
